lenders.name: Betsy
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's our social responsibility to help others lead a successful life, working to continually make positive contributions be they emotional, intellectual, or financial.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach business classes to students aged 14-18 years old.  My students come from a variety of personal backgrounds.  Some live the city of St. Louis and some live in surrounding suburban and rural areas.  Some of my students are top athletic and academic performers in our school, while others have special needs due to physical and/or emotional challenges.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: I care and want to help entrepreneurs and hard working families expand or grow their businesses.  Life has been good to me and my family and I want to share my rewards with others so that their lives can be good as well,
lenders.occupational_info: I look for innovative ways to solve problems and try to inspire others to be creative and live their lives to the fullest.

lenders.name: Louise
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of the human spirit at every level- we can ALL change lives. I am in awe of all these resilient entrepreuneurs.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: We live in a digital age; thousands of miles can be be travelled in seconds! This is a wonderful way to give.
lenders.occupational_info: Purchasing Manager

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I want to see decent, hard working people have a chance to change their lives.  I believe offering these types of opportunities to people across the world will ultimately benefit everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage and develop real estate.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because:
Poverty in the world is an artificial creation. It does not belong to the human civilization.
-Dr. Muhammad Yunus
lenders.occupational_info: CSR , ENVIRONMENTAL CONSCIOUSNESS AND REDUCTION OF WASTE. RENEWABLE ENERGY. POVERTY AND DISEASE ERADICATION

lenders.name: Matt and Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: We create and design websites for churches and other organizations.

lenders.name: Paul & Carole
lenders.loan_because: My brother gave me lottery tickets for my birthday and these loans represent my winnings.  I hope my good fortune continues for Kiva entreprenuers.
lenders.occupational_info: We both work(ed) for General Electric in New York (chemist & administrative assistant)and have for 66 years (total!).

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of being responsible and accountable for one's own life and the freedom that it brings including the leadership that comes forth from that.  My vision for the world is that all willing people live their lives experiencing freedom and joy, creating wealth and prosperity and sharing it with those around them.

lenders.name: maverick
lenders.loan_because: I want to help more people get a better life, and I hope they can in turn help others as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I do research in Computer Science.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: Because microfinance works to grow developing economies, and personal connections via web 2.0 are the best way to do microfinance.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies use computers and technology to be more productive.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit helps.
lenders.occupational_info: I make movies.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: It\'s doing things right and lending to a small business owner in a 3rd world country can do the most good.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Mountain Guide and Ski Patroller.

lenders.name: Hilary
lenders.loan_because: I realize what a difference a small contribution from several different people can make to a woman\'s life in another part of the world. It\'s exciting to make such a personal connection and to help in this way.
lenders.occupational_info: I drove buses for disabled passengers in Toronto for most of my working life. Now I am retired and am volunteering to help build houses through Habitat for Humanity so that people who might not otherwise have a chance to live in their own homes might do so.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.occupational_info: I write for television.  Mostly for kids\' shows.

lenders.name: jackie and stephen
lenders.loan_because: It is very easy to feel overwhelmed about the problems facing our world and think that there is nothing we can do to have a positive impact on the lives of others.  Kiva give me a way to do just that.
lenders.occupational_info: I specialize in helping people discover what they are in alignment with and what they would prefer to align with.  Then I help them change their vibration to align with their deepest desires.  I've helped people from all over the globe.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: We have a responsibility to help those less fortunate.  Inequality of wealth will be solved much more easily by creating wealth in poorer nations rather than any form of redistribution.
lenders.occupational_info: I help design and manage the factory that makes memory chips for cell phones.

lenders.name: Rick and Dana
lenders.occupation: Owner of Audio & Video retail Store
lenders.loan_because: I beleive we are all connected to one another. I love the fact that I can help someone enpower themselves to create a better life.Hopefully in turn\\r\\nthey will help others. We are here to create our experience.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a store of my own. Retail and wholesale of audio and video merchandise, which includes installation and design in automobiles and homes. We create music and video\\r\\nexperience to our clients.

lenders.name: Marguerite
lenders.loan_because: I live in a country where even those of us who think we dont earn a lot, are incredibly well off compared with others. I want to share a little with people who need a helping hand.

lenders.name: Lee4
lenders.loan_because: We are emigrants from Africa and understand the challenges that face entrepreneurs in the developing world. Predatory lending practices and non-existent banking infrastructure make starting a business a nightmare. More power to Kiva!

lenders.name: Nika
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for everything that has been given to me. I care about the future of this planet, and believe that the only way to build a better future is to give back.

lenders.name: Russell
lenders.loan_because: Kiva just seems like a brilliant idea.

lenders.name: Douglas

lenders.name: Christmas Fund
lenders.loan_because: I started this fund to give shares to my relatives for Christmas 2006. It started with 4 borrowers and at this point has lent to 22 borrowers (at 6/28/2011) with only one default.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a financial analyst in New York City.

lenders.loan_because: We believe that it is the duty of those who have been empowered by chance to empower others by choice.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a teacher, a nurse, an automotive parts reseller, an office worker, and a computer programmer.

lenders.name: SusanNepaliKeroseneQueue
lenders.occupation: grandma, liberal activist, and retired landlady
lenders.loan_because: I'm passing onward, and expanding on, the help I've received in my life.
lenders.occupational_info:
Over the years, I've become a feminist and reproductive and GLBT rights advocate.  I've taught biology, worked as an educator for Planned Parenthood, and been a landlady. I'm married and raised two sons. I"ve lived briefly in Nepal, Yorkshire England, and northern Greece. I've learned to do plumbing (working with water pipes and such), electrical, and other building maintenance tasks.  Now I can spend more time with my grandchildren, fixing up my own house - and being an international microfinancier on Kiva !

About my screen name.  When I joined my first team, now called the A+ team, and made a few posts, there was another Susan posting as well.  My profile pic showed me on a ladder doing wiring.  To help people discern which messages belonged to which Susan, I became Susanwithladders.   On our last working trip to Kathmandu, (my husband was working with the Urban Planning Department at the engineering college of Tribhuvan University,  we were there during very severe shortages of all fuels, and rolling electrical blackouts.  One morning  before shops opened, I noticed plastic containers lined up along the curb.  It turned out that the word was that a shipment of kerosene had arrived.  Rather than stand in yet another line, people ran a long cord through the handles of the plastic jugs to keep their jugs' places in the lines.  The photo I took of those jugs seemed to me to be a fitting reminder of how tough life often is for Kiva borrowers.  So, I then became SusanNepaliKeroseneQueue.   The photo is my default profile pic.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: This is such a great idea!

lenders.name: Kristen

lenders.name: Neal
lenders.loan_because: I want other people to succeed.

lenders.name: Peter and Monica Irvine
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to participate in the global economy.  We support primarily women-owned businesses with prospects for growth and a track record of repaying previous micro-credit loans.
lenders.occupational_info: Monica works for an international non-profit in the environmental field and Peter works for the government in the aviation field.

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.occupational_info: I make movies

lenders.name: Rena
lenders.loan_because: I want to change the world.

lenders.name: Damien
lenders.loan_because: I feel that helping the world is my first and greatest duty.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I want to see "the little guy" succeed!  I have come to believe microlending is a very important part of people's ability to improve and grow their small businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I am just beginning a new job that will focus on writing, something I love to do!

lenders.name: Joshua Dziabiak
lenders.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.

lenders.name: Mark, Nanda, & Annie

lenders.occupational_info: Mark & Nanda both work to support our family, and little Annie goes to day care all day.

lenders.name: Irma
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves and their families to a better life

lenders.name: nik and melissa

lenders.occupational_info: I hunt food and paint caves and bang rocks together for fun while my gorgeous companion writes beautiful fiction in her spare time (when she is not wreaking criminal havoc foiling the good intentions of superheroes).

lenders.name: Corinne
lenders.loan_because: I now can

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I have a fortunate life and enjoy being able to directly support hard working people who are trying to improve their lives and, thereby, the world we all share.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: Studying Development Economics, I've realised how important it is to incite people to make things happen for themselves.

lenders.name: Cheikhou

lenders.name: Alex

lenders.occupational_info: I am a fiction writer, and an investor in real estate and business start ups.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I want to enable those who have the desire and drive to succeed but are limited due to circumstances beyond their control.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: because I can!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher of science and history for students in rural Australia.

lenders.name: Benjie
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a good way to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I do electrical work on commercial and industrial buildings, sometimes houses.

lenders.name: nx2c.com
lenders.loan_because: I would like to participate in enabling many people, all over the world, to be successful.  And maybe someday, celebrating their success with them, in person.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse working in a busy,  city-hospital emergency room.

lenders.name: Rob Sandbach
lenders.loan_because: indieSpring believes that all people should be able to support themselves and their family through a willingness to work hard and establish a business. Investing, rather than giving, is the greatest sustainable way of helping those less fortunate than ourselves.

lenders.name: NABUKENYA
lenders.loan_because: i want to start up a  small modern Saloon in our city so as to uplift my stardards of living.
lenders.occupational_info: As a teacher, our pay is so so so little to cater for my needs and i would like at least to add on something to push me going.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: "Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand, Come, ye blessed of my Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world: For I was an hungred, and ye gave me meat: I was thirsty, and ye gave me drink: I was a stranger, and ye took me in: Naked, and ye clothed me: I was sick, and ye visited me: I was in prison, and ye came unto me. ... Verily I say unto you, Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren, ye have done it unto me." - Matthew 25:34-36, 40

lenders.name: Cecilia
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that microloans are the way 
to improve life for all.

lenders.name: Rhonda & Jack
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: We are wild blueberry farmers in Maine.

lenders.name: Joe & Betty
lenders.loan_because: we're lucky enough to have something to give.

lenders.name: Sam and Jeff
lenders.loan_because: We can!
lenders.occupational_info: We are outdoor experiential educators.

lenders.name: adoo
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and I want to share that blessing.
lenders.occupational_info: I design web sites and business identities such as logos and cards and signs.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping those who help themselves.  I have needed help in my life and I just want to return the opportunity to people who genuinely will better themselves and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people feel better.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I teach  surgery for the university in my home town.

lenders.name: Three Nails
lenders.loan_because: We can help people easily while building a portfolio that can continue to offer help over time.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a small house church movement in the United States.  We meet in our houses and gather together throughout the week to worship and spend time with one another.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: I am unable to make BIG donations that will really change the world, but loaning and re-loaning funds to those who need it most will multiply the funds I have, AND help others meet basic needs.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell computer stuff.  to make it possible for large companies to have access to the internet and to keep their info safe.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people when their computer has problems.

lenders.name: AbdAllah & Khadija
lenders.loan_because: Whosoever removes a worldly grief from a believer, Allah will remove from him one of the griefs of the Day of Judgment. Whosoever alleviates [the lot of] a needy person, Allah will alleviate [his lot] in this world and the next. Whosoever shields a Muslim, Allah will shield him in this world and the next. Allah will aid a slave [of His] so long as the slave aids his brother. Whosoever follows a path to seek knowledge therein, Allah will make easy for him a path to Paradise. No people gather together in one of the houses of Allah, reciting the Book of Allah and studying it among themselves, but tranquility and peace descends upon them, mercy envelopes them, the angels surround them, and Allah makes mention of them amongst those who are with Him. And whosoever is slowed down by his actions will not be hastened forward by his lineage. (A hadith from a collection by An-Nawawi)

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is important to help each other.

lenders.name: Data Mobility Group LLC
lenders.loan_because: Kiva loans pay in dividends not available with traditional investing - the satisfaction of knowing that we are helping those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: We explain people, process and technology challenges and opportunities to businesses around the globe.

lenders.name: Carol & Roger
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people who show initiative and are trying to help themselves and their family/community
lenders.occupational_info: Retired medical social worker and university professor

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe that helping people who need a little to get started can help alleviate world poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the former editor of a weekly newspaper, now retired and writing in weekly newspapers in my area on a free-lance basis.

lenders.name: John+Jen=Finn+Bodhi
lenders.loan_because: we can and we believe that we should support those less fortunate than us, especially those who are challenging their abilities and the system to better themselves and their families while inspiring others to do the same

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because:
Mohammed Yunus has set a great example.
As you hand it out, it will be handed back.
lenders.occupational_info: Electronic components sales such as components to cellphone makers.

lenders.name: Kymberlie R. McGuire
lenders.loan_because: It's hard to pull yourself up some times and everything I can do to help someone else is well worth it.
lenders.occupational_info: I do technical support for a company that creates weblog software.  This means that I help people get their blogs up and running so they can communicate with friends, family, or colleagues.

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people starting or improving their business. By loaning directly to the person we hope our money will help them and doesn't disappear into a large organization
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an IT project manager, implementing software within a large corporation.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: People need people not governments.
lenders.occupational_info: I dig a hole and plant something.

lenders.name: Hugh
lenders.loan_because: As a former Peace Corps volunteer and USAID small business development contractor, I've seen how a little money in the right hands can go a long way.

lenders.name: Nap
lenders.loan_because: investing in Africa is investing in the redemption of the whole planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I make music and use vocals to convey a conscious message.

lenders.name: Elisabeth & Bill
lenders.loan_because: We are atheists. Since we do not believe in supernatural intervention, we want to help make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Samantha and Adrian
lenders.loan_because: We want to help other people

lenders.name: Island Literary Salon
lenders.loan_because: We want to share our good fortune.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of women with various jobs and backgrounds, who share a love of reading and being with each other as good friends.

lenders.name: Rob & Jenn
lenders.loan_because: We want to help provide people with opportunities that they would not otherwise have.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I just love the idea of this. It\'s so much more personal to be able to hand pick where your money will be going and see the face of the person you\'re helping out.
lenders.occupational_info: Well, I pretty much just go to school. I\'m  going to school to recieve my degree in International Studies with a concentration in International Social Justice. That basically will help me try and make the world a better place by helping the people who need help the most and maybe live in a place where there are a lot of problems.

lenders.name: Marc Rigaux
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: A little can go a long way.

lenders.name: bryan
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people with their ideas for how to improve their lives not my ideas.
lenders.occupational_info: I find exciting ways to teach people about science in museums.  I specifically am interested in how technology can be helpful in this process.

lenders.name: Jason Peery Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people move forward!

lenders.name: Benno
lenders.loan_because: To further free enterprise throughout the world. It is the small businesses that create wide-spread prosperity.
lenders.occupational_info: Looking for new opportunities...

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I think that kiva can really make a difference and I want to be part of this.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a business school and work with executives around the world

lenders.name: Joe L.
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!!
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people live healthier, longer, lives.

lenders.name: Yee Siau

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: takes money to make money
lenders.occupational_info: entrepreneurial

lenders.loan_because: It is a tangible way to make a difference in our world
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a University program, teaching parents.

lenders.name: Jesper Larsson
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea behind micro credits; helping people help themselves, simply by giving them a chance to a loan.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with Creative Social Responsibility

lenders.name: james
lenders.loan_because: I want to "lend" a helping hand
lenders.occupational_info: I sit at a desk in front of a computer

lenders.name: Jason McVicar
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.  Organizations such as Kiva are the counter current to the vast flow riches toward the rich.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a medical student in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I want to stay involved in a community I used to be a part of but which I am no longer able to visit frequently.
lenders.occupational_info: RPCV

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I have been helped by strangers and my life has been made better for it. I would like to do the same for someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach in a high school for teenage mothers.

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.occupational_info: My company helps businesses overcome challenges they are facing

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: We are all connected.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I have traveled to Africa, Southeast Asia, Central America and India for my work with an NGO and I am always amazed at how hard people are willing to work to make their lives and their families lives better.  I honestly believe that if we work as partners with people to give them the tools they need to educate and empower themselves and those around them that they will lift themselves out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a consultant with banks and financial firms, I also work with one of the big environmental NGO's to develop financial plans for conservation throughout the world

lenders.name: Ryo
lenders.occupational_info: Student

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in attempting to help people get back up on their feet again and have seen and heard many success stories.  Many people don't want simple charity, they want the opportunity to earn a living for themselves which really is better in the long term is better because it offers them independence and stability.

I also believe this is one of the best methods for combating poverty around the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a student, going to university so that I can be trained to become a pastor at a church.

Right now I teach teenagers at my church and do bible studies and Sunday school with them.

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: I have been given much!

lenders.name: Alanna
lenders.loan_because: It’s a privilege to support women microentrepreneurs across the world.

lenders.name: Josephine & Royal
lenders.loan_because: We've decided not to make additional loans until Kiva stops sponsoring loans to cockfighting businesses. We've enjoyed being part of Kiva and we respect the good work this organization is doing, but we believe everyone has the responsibility not to promote gratuitous cruelty.
lenders.occupational_info: Josephine studies and teaches writing at a college, and Royal works for the Department of Health, analyzing ground water contamination.

lenders.name: Alice & Oliver
lenders.loan_because: because we have been given much, we too must give!

lenders.name: Yuri
lenders.loan_because: The only thing more fulfilling than building your own successful business is helping someone else build theirs.
lenders.occupational_info: I help teams build software for large companies to manage the flow of work across their organizations.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic way to lend money to people and by getting regular updates you can see how your money is making a difference to someone elses life!
lenders.occupational_info: i have too much work... not so much fun

lenders.name: Dustin
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: How could you not help any way you could?  I know if tables turned I would be gracious for anyone who believed in me and my abilities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital setting helping women who may or are losing their pregnancies by delivering their babies too early.  I also teach students nursing.

lenders.name: julien
lenders.loan_because: C\'est une manière efficace de venir en aide sans arrogance, pour permettre aux personnes plus défavoriser de réaliser leurs rêves

lenders.name: Vicki
lenders.loan_because: This is such a simple way to help people we are interconnected with, but will never meet.

lenders.name: Terry & Denise
lenders.loan_because: We think Kiva is a great way to help others.  We have been fortunate in our lives and would like to help others have an opportunity to make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: We live in Saudi Arabia where Terry is an exporation geophysicist.

lenders.name: richard
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able help those who help themselves. This seems to be a great way doing that.\r\nGood Luck!

lenders.name: Jean-Claude
lenders.loan_because: It is such a wonderful idea, and the whole process so simple to participate in!

lenders.name: stephane
lenders.loan_because: It's fun

lenders.name: Warren
lenders.loan_because: I want to have a connection with people across the world, and to share the resources that God has blessed me with.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a social work licensure supervisor.

lenders.name: Nicolette
lenders.loan_because: My grandparents gave me a Kiva gift certificate for Christmas. I think the idea is absolutely fantastic and I'm eager to help other people!

lenders.name: Brendan
lenders.loan_because: To help provide opportunity, fairness, and hope.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be prosperous because my great-grandparents built businesses after immigrating to the United States.  I  want to help others build better lives for their children and grandchildren.
lenders.occupational_info: I am helping to build a search engine to help people in Boston find news and information in their communities.

lenders.name: Hank and Vicki
lenders.occupation: Hank is retired. Vicki is a teacher
lenders.loan_because: We want to give a helping hand to people who are attempting to improve their quality of life

lenders.name: Misha
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school everyday and work hard so I can go to college.  I want to be an archeologist.

lenders.name: donna_m
lenders.loan_because:
Up until 2006, poverty, disease and death in the developing countries seemed to be a problem that was so huge that nothing I could do would help. So I did nothing. 

I was wrong. 

The same amount that I would spend on going to a movie can help a family put food on the table, find clean water, send their children to school for education, and build a business - even employ more people to make many lives better. I can no longer do nothing.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a photographer who shoots artistic things like nature and buildings, as well as musicians and bands for a few music magazines. I also write for the same magazines

lenders.name: Michael and Matthew
lenders.loan_because: We want to teach our son that we are part of a much larger community.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: This is a chance to really help someone who deserves it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graduate student studying geological engineering.

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: I want to share what I have.
lenders.occupational_info: I help children with emotional problems.

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: We\'re all in this together.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I like the fact that my $1 can be used over and over to help more than one person.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: Over a decade ago, my grandmother Ellowese –a lovely, business-savvy, and very pious woman– presented me with a generous financial gift. Although I know she intended for me to invest in stocks, instead I chose to invest in myself, and along with my mother, started a graphics business.  In the years since it has often been a struggle, many times scary, and sometimes exausting, but I wouldn\'t trade the experiences we\'ve had or the friends we\'ve made for all the wealth in the world.  It\'s been an adventure and I know I will never be a slave to anyone because she gave me the gift of \"teaching a man to fish\".  I was a risky investment, but ten years later we have helped so many people make their dreams a reality and I personally have so much more to offer.  All because of her belief in me.  I am so excited to have found this service and am loaning in her name, and in her memory.  I know she would have approved.  Thanks Grandma!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people build online (internet) businesses.

lenders.name: Drew
lenders.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance to be able to support themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I study sociology.

lenders.name: Marla
lenders.loan_because: this was a Christmas gift from my son.  I think it\'s a wonderful idea, and I have a special place in my heart for the people of Mexico.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English Language Learners at a high school in San Diego County, California.  Most of them are from Mexico.

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of one.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: Life is full of opportunities :)

lenders.name: JungFu
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the ability of every person to succeed if given the opportunity and support, and that small business ownership can be one of the most empowering vehicles for self-sufficiency and community development.
lenders.occupational_info: I build capacity at organizations through staff development and revenue generation.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves to see their dreams and hopes come true. If I can help even one person, the world is a richer, better place to live.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a major chemical company, scheduling production for insulation product which help cool and heat homes and businesses.  The company I work for is also a major contributor to Habitat for Humanity.

lenders.name: James and Denise
lenders.loan_because: We loan because it is the right thing to do.  It does our hearts good to know that we can help (even just a little) somebody else that is, maybe, not as fortunate as we are.

lenders.name: Stefan
lenders.loan_because: Someone has helped me.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.occupational_info: I am a pilot in the Air Force

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: One cannot obtain water from the earth without \\\'priming the pump\\\'. Therefore, we must also prime the social pump for humanity to benefit.
lenders.occupational_info: I paint pictures with words to make light of the dark.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I remember visiting Mexico when I was a child and the impact I had from being approached by impoverished children. Since then I made a promise to myself that I would find some way to help people in these conditions. I believe I have found what I have been looking for. ^_^
lenders.occupational_info: I have been translating for Kiva since the summer of '09.

lenders.name: morgan and peter
lenders.loan_because: It is important to me that my daughter see how hard people work to support themselves and their families and that it is important to support others.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: People need to get creative if anything's going to change. I like that Kiva is part of an innovative movement that increases the likelihood of positive change in the world. I lend because my faith demands that we prefer the poor to ourselves, and this is one small way to take one small step in the direction of being Christ-like.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I am happy to help people around the world see Americans reach out to them.  Other people helped my family, so I am happy to help yours.
lenders.occupational_info: I write books.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Entrepreneurs are badasses, so hell yeah I\'ll help \'em out a bit.

lenders.name: Kendall
lenders.loan_because: A small amount to me is a great amount for another.

lenders.name: Myrna
lenders.loan_because: God has been good to me and I enjoy helping others.

lenders.name: curt
lenders.loan_because: hopefully the loans will make a difference in some deserving lives
lenders.occupational_info: capital formation

lenders.name: Slattery
lenders.loan_because: Good investment. Probably safer than S&P500!

lenders.name: Fred Cipriano
lenders.occupational_info:

(215)3167zero83

lenders.name: Kirk
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Ray & Brenda
lenders.loan_because: We understand the need for capital in small business start-ups
lenders.occupational_info: retired small business owners

lenders.name: Pete
lenders.loan_because: Every person deserves a chance at success

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is important to help others in anyway we can. I admire people who have the strength to start and run their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: When people buy a home I make sure all of the paperwork is correct.

lenders.name: Mukkul
lenders.loan_because: Earning 4-5% interest on the cash doesnt feel as satisfying :)\r\nI\'m fortunate enough to enjoy life as I want it and in most cases I would probably spend more on a weekend trip to some city, so its almost a no brainer to loan.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on computers, build software.

lenders.name: Cory
lenders.loan_because: The dreams are so big, but they\'re so easy to help make come true. What I spend on a couple lunches can help somebody start his or her own business--a business that will help feed a family and contribute to a community. That\'s a beautiful thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I design computer programs that people in hospitals use. What I do helps sick people receive care more quickly, more efficiently, and more safely.
